website_summaries.verdict: This undermount product is a great choice for those wanting a smaller hand sink at a cheaper price.
pros: Sink features a sound deadening pad
Rounded construction offers an easy-to-clean design
cons: A few customers complained that the online measurements were incorrect

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me in a drop in mounting application. Looks and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Used in drop in mounting with adhesive holding it to my counter top. The quality of this sink in terms of thickness, finish and sound insulation sprayed on the underside is comparable to much more expensive sinks. I bought one which was an open box so I saved even more than the already low price. If you shop around at the big box stores you will find the special application sinks are much more expensive so this was a good buy. I bought the 2" bar sink drain/strainer separately at a local large chain store for under $10. Highly recommend this sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: We love this sink
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect sink for our kitchen remodel, wide and deep but not too wide and deep. It's so nice to be able to put large pots or baking sheets all the way into the sink. It is also very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: jbs1969

customer_reviews.title: Good sized Bar Sink
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and size for a bar sink. But seems to have some kinda film on the bowl that keeps coming off when wiped with a paper towel. I hope that the finish is not coming off. Or could be just the oilish protection that the Chinese manufacturer puts on that we will find later causes some sort of cancer. Aside from the cancer scare, the bowl seems to do its job. Was a bit temperamental installing a drain, had to use more putty than expected to keep it from leaking. All is fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Utah Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the nasty sink which was in the house we recently purchased. Lovely deep sink, great for washing pots and pans. I have only had dual sinks in the past and was worried about going to a single sink, but I'm very happy with this - plus the price beat our local hardware stores bu quite a bit! Can't beat amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Busyworkingmom

customer_reviews.title: This sink is super deep! That took a bit to get used ...
customer_reviews.text: This sink is super deep! That took a bit to get used to since my hubby and I are tall, but overall I'm pretty happy with it! The only time I notice the thinner stainless steel is when I pour hot water into the sink to drain noodles (or whatever). The sink will buckle/warp and make a loud "Pop" every time due to the heat transfer ... not a major problem, no long-term issues but it is annoying. Great sink for the price, though :-)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, heavy duty. Template mostly worked so installation was fairly easy. Didn't get the use of the included clamps at all based on the instructions plus they are way too big. Tossed them and used another method for installation.
customer_reviews.author: C_Kritter

customer_reviews.title: Look for others....
customer_reviews.text: Meh.....It looks okay, but after the sink drains, a puddle of water sits in the bottom...forever. It's not sloped enough on the bottom to fully drain. That part kind of sucks, because water spots on stainless, stink to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: The sink is excellent quality material
customer_reviews.text: The sink is excellent quality material. My only issue is the sink came with a small dent in one of the corners and from what I can tell it was not from poor shipping. For the sake of time on my counter tops being installed I was unable to exchange it. I would recommend the product to anyone but allow for more time than I did in order to exchange if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Seems well made/good quality. Price was reasonable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are incorrect!
customer_reviews.text: Their measurements on this are not correct. Ordered to finish a job and there was no way it was big enough. I ordered it because their stated measurements were what I needed. But that is not what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installed in basement bar, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This product was installed underneath a granite counter top for a basement bar, it looks great and has functioned as a sink should... Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Large Sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is exactly what I wanted. It is absolutely fabulous for the price. We also purchased a pull-down faucet. I would definitely recommend the pull down faucet or some sort of flexible spray hose - because this sink is so wide, sometimes food can be difficult to get to the drain. Having the spray hose helps wash stuff into the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Stutz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: I installed this into my sprinter van's kitchen, and it's beautiful. Only bummer is I can't find a decent sink protector for the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Poppins

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to swim in!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is PERFECT! It's durable and beautiful. I could't wait for my kitchen to be remodeled to put it in. I did need to have the drain moved to accommodate the depth especially with a garbage disposal attached. It was worth the additional cost.
customer_reviews.author: Theknowerofstuff

customer_reviews.title: Value, looks, and function
customer_reviews.text: Very deep and looks great, nice thick walls with good sound "insulation". Deep enough to wash a small dog easily!! Only drawback is it does stain somewhat easily. Somehow got a white ring already. Not sure what caused it. You'll save a ton vs retail and vey good quality for the price. Comes with a template for your cutout and support tabs
customer_reviews.author: mims

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: perfect size and dimensions for a kitchen sink in my camper. any small er would be an issue with dishes fitting, any larger would be an issue with counter space
customer_reviews.author: Rick N.

customer_reviews.title: Used in a modified Singer Sewing Machine Stand
customer_reviews.text: High Quality sink. Very deep and have had no issues. I took an old Singer Sewing machine stand and modified it so my wife could use it for her guests when they come over. She places ice and then drinks inside which is really different.
customer_reviews.author: 🎄 GrandpaJake 🎄

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sink at a good price. Almost like a small bathtub compared to my old sink. I love the size, I love that it's a single basin rather than a double basin.
customer_reviews.author: MW LM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just put in new countertops. This sink is awesome! Will never go back to a dual basin sink again.
customer_reviews.author: John Helm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks good and deep for a basement man cave sink.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sink.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little sink for the money. Used it in a laundry room I built on the house. No complaints. It does use a bar sized drain so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Billings

customer_reviews.title: Great value/Great Look!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. Just installed it. Construction is great. Very roomy and looks great. The only draw back is , the sink is very deep and if you are a tall person, standing for a long time over this sink, could cause a backache.
customer_reviews.author: patti marconi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for quite a few months. Don't know how I ever did without it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Sumter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and high quality sink
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well-made and heavy sink. It's the perfect size for our outdoor kitchen, with the sink deep enough to put bar glasses and rinse of cutting boards. Very nicely finished with a matte and not shiny, cheap polish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice. What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink. Deep Looks modern. The picture makes it look shinier that how it is. Like more light silver than it actually is
customer_reviews.author: Dominika

customer_reviews.title: Kingston Brass sink
customer_reviews.text: Good value. The finish could be smoother for ease of cleaning. It is very large and deep allowsing the washing of many items that don't fit in a typical two bowl sink.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Love my sink
customer_reviews.text: Love my sink. Was worried i might regret getting a single basin but so far it's been perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa a.m.s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Sound-proof coating ALL the way around (not just at the bottom). Saved about $80 from retail.
customer_reviews.author: DWiGuy

customer_reviews.title: Best small sink ever!
customer_reviews.text: What a great sink this is!! Hope it lasts a long time as a better replacement sink would be hard to find in any price range.
customer_reviews.author: HCEMT

customer_reviews.title: Deep sink
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep sink and installed easily under our concrete countertops.
customer_reviews.author: Martin L. Carsner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, had a double sink before and am very happy with this sink. Had no trouble installing it
customer_reviews.author: Susan Peretson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sink. Very large and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: sunnydd

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink! It is deep enough for even my canning pot to be washed in. Very nice looking as well. First one they shipped had been damaged in transit and they had me a new one in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bar, prep or small sink
customer_reviews.text: excellent small sink nice and deep good quality very reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: robert rickman

customer_reviews.title: Big, Deep and Lovely Stainless Steel Sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink it is a great value and so much nicer then anything i could find in the big box hardware stores.
customer_reviews.author: pegsta

customer_reviews.title: Sink looked ok but template on box was for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sink looked ok but template on box was for a different sink which caused wrong size hole cut in new granite countertop
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Lefler

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Love this sink! The bad part is you can put lots of dirty dishes and not even know it! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Seashells

customer_reviews.title: in love
customer_reviews.text: It installed so easily and its so big! I love this sink
customer_reviews.author: TherZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 30 inch sink base!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! It was difficult finding a sink to fit our 30 inch sink base. I didn't want a 25 inch sink, but couldn't find many options that would fill the whole space. This sink fits like a glove and looks great! I love the depth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zerbs

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Can't wait to see it complete our kitchen remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value...looks way more expensive than it was, and super deep!!!
customer_reviews.author: puppydog

customer_reviews.title: ss sink w solid surface
customer_reviews.text: We are a full cabinet & counter top shop, this was installed undermount under solid surface materal ..... look great and realy like the extra deep
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. I get so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits perfectly in our new kitchen. It is very deep too.
customer_reviews.author: le petit pablo

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sink, very deep
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the sink. Very deep, great for large pots and pans. Great deal too!! One of my favorite fixtures in my new home.
customer_reviews.author: Jobie W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stainless steel sink and the depth is perfect. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Overall good sink. Only reason I did not give it ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall good sink. Only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because the sink hole was directly in the center of the sink. It is advertised on amazon and the picture indicates that the sink hole was placed at the center back part of the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: ... each side of my new sink cabinet but fiS BEAUTIFULLY with my new
customer_reviews.text: Had to put a notch on each side of my new sink cabinet but fiS BEAUTIFULLY with my new countertop
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Sink is nice and deep and seems like good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sink is nice and deep and seems like good quality. Has sound deadening on the backside. However the picture shows the drain hole in the back of the sink and this is not what I received. The sink I received had the drain hole in the middle which actually worked out better for the plumbing of my disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Sink
customer_reviews.text: The sink was just as promised and works well for our needs. Also, it cleans up well. We did need to purchase a drain for it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: C& M
customer_reviews.text: great product, used in a new island we put in our kitchen. Our plumber said it was of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: carol hicks

customer_reviews.title: beautiful deep sink!
customer_reviews.text: We have just installed the kingston new sink with granite countertops--we shall see how it goes. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: mabulloc

customer_reviews.title: the quality o this product is ok.
customer_reviews.text: the quality o this product is ok. Be careful, if you use the paper template to help you open a hole on your counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Allen&Alice

product_meta.title: Kingston Brass Gourmetier GKUS16168 Undermount Single Bowl Bar Sink 16x16x8 (LxWxD) Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Style:GKUS16168| Size:16-Inch-Length by 16-Inch-Width by 8-Inch-Depth, 18 GaugeThe single-bowl undermount kitchen sink features a long square-shaped basin measured 16-Inch in length and width. The basin contains more than enough space for washing kitchen appliances, preparing food and is made of high quality stainless steel for reliance and durability. The sink is also fully protected by a heavy-duty sound deadening pad to minimize noise while washing appliances in the sink.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The single-bowl undermount kitchen sink features a long square-shaped basin measured 16-Inch in length and width. The basin contains more than enough space for washing kitchen appliances, preparing food and is made of high quality stainless steel for reliance and durability. The sink is also fully protected by a heavy-duty sound deadening pad to minimize noise while washing appliances in the sink.
feature_bullets: Includes a sound-deadening pad and full undercoating for sound absorption.
18-Gauge thickness with no pre-drilled faucet hole. 2.06 inches drain
Exposed surfaces are hand-polished to a lustrous brushed nickel finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars103 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
